titles.title: Burdens Are Lifted At Calvary (easy nice)

properties.verseOrder: v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Burdens are lifted at Calvary Calvary Calvary Burdens are lifted at Calvary Jesus is very near{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Days are filled with sorrow and care Hearts are lonely and drear Burdens are lifted at Calvary Jesus is very near{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Cast your care on Jesus today Leave your worry and fear Burdens are lifted at Calvary Jesus is very near{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Troubled soul the Savior can see Every heart-ache and tear Burdens are lifted at Calvary Jesus is very near{/lang-eng}
